Description:
Investors!! This is IT!!
Builders Guarantee rental of $400per/week for the first year or paying the shortfall at settlement until tenant secured.
This is a rare opportunity to own this architecturally designed town home bringing together exceptional living and central locality.
Within walking distance to all amenities and public transport, this home offers an enviable opportunity to own your own piece of exclusive real estate. Boasting top floor master bedroom with ensuite, walk in robe, and balcony, central kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops, undermount sink, glass splashback and stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, timber floors to living areas, quality tiles to all wet areas, private courtyard, roof top gardens, heating and cooling, and intercom with 2 screens complete this perfect package.
Guaranteed to impress, with quality fixtures and fittings throughout and detailed specifications available on request, be a part of this Epping Central transformation!
For more information, please visit: www.18houstonstreet.com
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Great potential to invest or update
Set in a quiet court location, close to Westfield Plenty Valley, South Morang train station, Pacific Epping and local shops, this three bedroom home will offer a great investment for many years to come.
Offering three bedrooms all with robes, a central bathroom, living room with adjoining dining and kitchen. This original abode offers plenty of potential to update or renovate to your liking. Complete with a generous back yard, plenty of off street car parking, an under cover pergola, heating throughout, and walking distance to local parklands. Perfectly suited for an investor, renovator, or a first home buyer looking for an affordable opportunity to enter the market. Currently leased on periodic tenancy, also available for vacant possession.

Description:
COMBINED INDUSTRIAL AND LIVING SPACE
A rare and outstanding opportunity for smart buyers and astute investors to acquire this commercial property on huge land approx 884m2 with bonus 4 bedroom BV home in prime location with high exposure for any business to capitalise on. On offer is factory /warehouse with reception area, office, expansive floor space, designated staff kitchen, toilets, washroom and roller door access. The spacious well maintained home comprises 4 bedrooms with BIRS, master with full ensuite and walk-in robes, open living floor plan incorporating living and dining areas, well equipped kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop, electric convection wall oven, central family bathroom with spa bath and separate laundry Features include gas ducted heating/ cooling, balconies, glass brick feature wall and secure double garage.
Rare opportunity not to be missed
Act quickly and avoid disappointment

590m²

Description:
EXCELLENT IMPROVER OR FIRST-HOME BUYER OPPORTUNITY $425,000-$465,000
Great opportunity for the first-home buyer with renovation in mind or it could be a possible development site STCA on this corner block of 527m2 approx.
There are three bedrooms, two living areas family bathrooms, family bathroom and a separate toilet.
The formal lounge room leads out to the kitchen and meals area and the additional sunroom/rumpus room as well.
The home is in a great location, and is great opportunity for the buyer willing to improve upon the existing dwelling
The house is a short drive to Westfield Shopping Centre, schools including Mill Park Secondary College and medical facilities.
And it is also a short drive to South Morang railway station, making it ideal to commute to the city.
Epping is one of the few parts of Melbourne where the lifestyle is relaxed, has excellent facilities has a community feel and still has affordable homes.

Description:
Prime Location at an Affordable Price
Location is the key aspect every buyer looks for and with 4 Worsley Court, the buyer gets a prime location at an affordable price!
Boasting four spacious bedrooms laid out timber floorboards with ensuite and a balcony overlooking a leafy backdrop in the master and BIRs in other bedrooms, a stylish well-appointed kitchen with walk in pantry and a fully functioning dishwasher, remote controlled double garage, central bathroom and laundry.
The property has been freshly painted and offers the buyer a vintage feel, with fully functioning wood fire heater, timber floor stair case, a formal entry into the house and a well maintained garden shed.
Within walking distance to local schools and Findon Rd shopping strip. Few minutes' drive to Westfield Shopping, Northern Hospital, Epping plaza, RMIT university and University hill.
Don't miss out, book your inspections today!
Internal area
195m²

Description:
Modern Easy Living in Epping's Aurora Estate
Situated in the popular Aurora Estate, this home is close to the Aurora town centre giving you a selection of shops, cafes, supermarkets, medical and recreational facilities. Also within close proximity to schools, early learning centres and parklands.
Comprising of 4 generous sized bedrooms with built in robes (master has full ensuite with twin vanities), main bathroom with separate bath and twin vanities, modern kitchen with stone bench tops, island bench, walk in pantry, dishwasher and 900mm stainless steel appliances, open plan family and dining areas, Cinema room (multiple living areas) and separate laundry.
Added features include split system heating/cooling, ducted heating, alarm, double remote garage with internal access, low maintenance yard and an alfresco.
Don't miss out on this amazing home, inspect now!

Ideal Family Home in a Walk to It All Location!
Located within the prized pocket of Epping Central, this well-presented home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, bedrooms 2 & 3 are serviced by a centrally located bathroom. A large lounge and dining area, kitchen with adjoining meals area following out to an alfresco perfect for entertaining. Ducted heating and cooling, low maintained gardens, oversized double garage with rear roller door.
All within walking distance of public transport, shops, cafes, parks and schools makes this home enticing option for first-home buyers, downsizers and investors.

Calling all Investors, downsizers and first home buyers we have a fantastic opportunity to secure a spacious 2 bedroom apartment only minutes away from Lyndarum shopping centre, Epping Views Primary school and public transport.

Description:
Investors The Time Is Now
With a perfect place to start as a first home buyer, home owner occupier or investor this is a perfect opportunity to get into the norths booming market. Located in the heart of the ever-sought-after suburb of Epping, this ideal home has everything to suit your needs.
Featuring three bedrooms with built in robes (master with walk in robe) and a central bathroom all located upstairs. Downstairs be greeted with a great sized living area, separate dining area which looks out to the lovely courtyard, well equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher as well as a separate laundry and toilet.
Other property features include under stairs storage, ducted heating, split system to living room, single car garage plus car spot and really good size court yard.
In a prime location it is conveniently situated within easy access to Pacific Epping, restaurants, Costco, Northern Hospital, Epping train station, bus stop, St Peter's Primary School, St. Monica's college, and NMIT.
Place it first on your list for inspection, you don't want to miss out on this opportunity!

-Ducted heating
-Split system unit for cooling.
-Remote operated garage or optional 3- bedroom.
-Main bedroom with walk in robe and semi-detached full ensuite.
-Built in robes to remaining bedrooms.
-Floor boards throughout.
-Beautiful alfresco arena to entertain family and friends for years to come.
Located in the prestigious Lyndarum Estate with abundance of well-maintained parklands, walking distance to Lyndarum North Shopping precinct, Epping Views schools, only a short stroll to Aurora shopping Village, Epping Plaza, health & leisure facilities, Northern hospital, Epping Train Station & easy access to freeway. Inspect Today.

Description:
The Start of Something Special
Whether youre looking for a first-home launching pad to kickstart your real estate adventure, or youre a seasoned investor with an eye for a good deal, 93 Redding Rise is going to appeal. Its a clever three by two with lashings of style and minimalist tendencies in an outstandingly convenient location right in the heart of Epping.
A solidly-built, east-facing, brick duplex built on the high side of the street, its visually striking from the modern façade right through to the low-maintenance backyard. Sitting on 356m2 (approx) of land, the floorplan maximises available space to present you with a very functional, very comfortable property.
The advanced kitchen come with modern conveniences such as a dishwasher and gas cooktop, complemented by masses of bench space and cupboard space. It adjoins an open-plan meals and family area, which opens out through sliding doors to a spacious wooden deck that will catch the eye of entertainers. There is also a second internal lounge thats got Netflix and Chill written all over it!
The large backyard is a blank canvas. Low maintenance at the moment, there is space to let your green fingers get to work and create a masterpiece. It separates the house from the double remote garage, which is accessed via a laneway running past the back of the property.
With schools, shops, transport and cafes all within a stones throw, this is one property that wont be on the market long. Get in touch with Ristic today for more information.

Description:
First home buyers, young families and investors!
Here is your chance to secure this much loved and well-maintained family home in the heart of Epping.
Walking distance to Greenbrook Shops, all local Primary and Secondary schools, Public Transport, Epping Train Station and only minutes' drive to Melbourne Polytechnic, Epping Plaza and Northern Hospital.
Beautifully presented and natural light-filled family home with hardwood floors and Cathedral ceilings, offering formal lounge and formal dining, lovely kitchen/ meals area, three good sized bedrooms and central bathroom, ducted heating, cooling plus extra gas wall heater.
Ample car accommodation, large shed/workshop or a man-cave, covered al fresco area in addition to low-maintenance garden on 555 s q m land approx.
Call today to inspect and be impressed by this perfect family home in a most desired location of Central Epping.
For more information, please contact:
Vanya Kostur 0408 717 748

Description:
Live Well!
Situated in one of Epping's most in demand locations, this home is positioned for the perfect lifestyle with easy access to all amenities including Lyndarum Shopping Centre, Aurora Village Shopping precinct including Coles and Aldi and plenty of cafes to choose from. Schools wont be a problem with plenty to choose from like Epping Views P.S, St Mary McKillop, Harvest Home P.S and the Edgars Creek Secondary College. Nestled on a generous 419m2 allotment with parklands at your doorstep.
This jewel showcases three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, a central well-appointed kitchen with 900mm stainless steel upright oven and stove with plenty of bench space overlooking the main living and dining area flowing out to a picturesque decked alfresco area and low maintenance backyard, big enough to entertain the largest of gatherings.
Additional bonuses include; timber floors, ducted heating, cooling, ceiling fans, reading nook, laundry and a double car garage.
A great decision for any investor, down-sizer or the ideal home for young families and first home buyers. Invest with confidence or create your perfect lifestyle.
